Class CipherFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.crypto.cipher.CipherFactory
public class CipherFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A Factory to instantiate block cipher instances.

$Revision: 1.2 $

Method Detail

getInstance

public static final IBlockCipher getInstance(java.lang.String name)
Returns an instance of a block cipher given its name.
Parameters:
algorithm - the case-insensitive name of the block cipher algorithm.
Returns:
an instance of the cipher algorithm, or null if none found.
Throws:
InternalError - if the implementation does not pass its self- test.

getNames

public static final java.util.Set getNames()
Returns a Set of block cipher implementation names supported by this Factory.
Returns:
a Set of block cipher names (Strings).
